price: 43. « Ô Marie ! obéis humblement à ton Seigneur, prosterne-toi, et incline-toi avec ceux qui s’inclinent. »
arabic: يَٰمَرۡيَمُ ٱقۡنُتِي لِرَبِّكِ وَٱسۡجُدِي وَٱرۡكَعِي مَعَ ٱلرَّٰكِعِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: yāmaryamu uq'nutī lirabbiki wa-us'judī wa-ir'kaʿī maʿa al-rākiʿīna
